transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+2% Ally Team Accuracy
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+2% Ally Team Accuracy
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: E Vroom Vroom Dead
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nAfter attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to activate a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from the ally with the highest Attack.
description: Attacks an enemy.\nAfter attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000040_1_1]</color> chance to activate a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from the ally with the highest Attack.

SKT_SECOND.name: Chainsaw Girl
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) When Mero's Health is healed, reduces the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Chainsaw Girl</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. (Activated at the end of an ally's turn)\n\n(Active Effect) Attacks all enemies and grants <color=#28d9ed>Lifesteal</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\nEnhanced Evasion Reduction (Ignores Resilience)

description: (Passive Effect) When Mero's Health is healed, reduces the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Chainsaw Girl</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000040_2_1] turn(s)</color>. (Activated at the end of an ally's turn)\n\n(Active Effect) Attacks all enemies and grants <color=#28d9ed>Lifesteal</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000040_2_3] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Mirsha Massacre
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance each to increase all allies' <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies.\nAfter attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to grant <color=#28d9ed>Immortality</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000040_3_1]</color> chance each to increase all allies' <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000040_3_1] turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies.\nAfter attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000040_3_2]</color> chance to grant <color=#28d9ed>Immortality</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000040_3_2] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000040_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000040_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000040_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
